Our Works

End-to-End Brand Identity & App Design for FollowRx

This project encompassed the complete creation of the FollowRx brand universe. We developed a cohesive visual identity from the ground up, culminating in a custom 3D robot owl mascot and a user-friendly mobile application, establishing a distinctive and trustworthy presence in the pharmaceutical tech space.

Rx2Go: Order Tracking Redesign

We transformed a basic utility into a transparent journey of trust. The redesigned tracking experience boosts user confidence with clear status updates, signature capture, and real-time ETA.

Comprehensive Brand Identity & Website for Dispatcher Academy

This project involved the creation of a complete brand ecosystem — from strategic visual identity to a functional website — for a pioneering educational institution. The goal was to establish a brand that embodies authority, modernity, and trust in the specialized field of dispatcher training.

THE LEADING PRESCRIPTION DELIVERY SERVICE IN NEW YORK

Save money, simplify deliveries, and keep everyone happy with cutting-edge solutions that integrate effortlessly with your current software.

Schedule a Call Get a Quote
Monitor all communications
Get proof of every delivery

Website and dashboard Rx2Go

We designed a clean, intuitive, and empathetic digital experience. The new Rx2Go website prioritizes clarity and trust above all else. A calming color palette and thoughtful iconography reinforce a sense of safety and well-being, positioning Rx2Go not just as a service, but as a dependable partner in health.

Marketing Materials for Conference

Crafting a cohesive design suite for a trio of companies — from booth and merch to booklets — ensuring a powerful and singular presence at a major US pharma convention.

Driver App for Flawless Logistics

We engineered an intuitive app for perfect deliveries. Built for iOS & Android, it equips drivers with offline maps, real-time error alerts, and a QA dashboard to maintain the highest service standards on every route.

UX/UI Design for a Multi-Page Pharmaceutical Software Platform

This project involved the comprehensive design of rx4route's digital presence—a leading provider of sophisticated software solutions for pharmacies. The challenge was to create a complex, multi-page website that reflects the company's expertise while ensuring intuitive navigation and clear information architecture for a B2B audience.

Dynamic Web Design with Bold Animation

This project focuses on creating a powerful and unforgettable first impression through the strategic use of vibrant color schemes and immersive animations. The design challenges the status quo, transforming a standard website into an interactive canvas.

Brand & Digital Foundation for a Healthcare Leader

We developed a full brand system and an expert-level website for PharmaStaff, translating their specialized healthcare outsourcing services into a compelling digital presence that attracts top talent and clients.

Web Design
Logic Made Visible

We craft digital experiences where clarity, elegance and strategy work together. Every interaction is designed to move users toward a winning outcome.

Landing Pages

What it is: a focused one-page website built for a selling, presenting a product, capturing leads, or promoting an offer.

What you get: a decisive, conversion-driven experience that removes distractions and directs users to take the action you need. A single, powerful move designed to turn interest into results.

Corporate Websites

What it is: a multi-page website that represents your company, your digital headquarters.

What you get: a clear, trustworthy, and structured online presence that explains who you are, what you do, and why you matter. We build authoritative platforms that strengthen your reputation and guide visitors through your business with ease.

E-commerce Platforms

What it is: a complete online store where customers can browse, choose, and purchase your products.

What you get: a seamless, intuitive shopping journey that increases sales, simplifies decisions, and supports growth at any scale. More than a store, your strategic sales engine.

CRM Systems

What it is: a tool that stores, organizes, and manages all your customer information in one place.

What you get: a clean, powerful command center that helps your team understand clients, track interactions, and make smarter decisions. We turn complex data into clear, actionable insight.

Mobile Applications

What it is: a custom mobile app tailored to your business and your users’ daily needs.

What you get: A simple, intuitive product your customers can use anytime, anywhere. A strategic move that meets users exactly where they are.

Graphic design & Branding
Your Identity, Defined

In a crowded market, your brand is your flag. We build core identities that make you instantly recognizable and impossible to forget.

Logo Design

What it is: a custom symbol that represents your company, your visual signature.

What you get: a strong, memorable mark that reflects your essence and sets you apart from competitors. The king on your chessboard: a clear, confident emblem of your strategic vision.

Corporate Identity

What it is: a complete visual system: colors, typography, styles, rules, and brand elements that form your brand’s look and feel.

What you get: a consistent, recognizable identity that ensures every touchpoint: your website, presentations, ads, and materials. A cohesive system for visual dominance, giving every move clarity and power.

Conference Stands

Command the room. We design immersive and impactful stands that draw attendees in and make your presence undeniable.

Business Cards

A classic move, perfected. We design elegant and memorable cards that facilitate powerful first connections.

Social Media Design

Development

Development
Flawless Execution

Strategy and design mean nothing without precision engineering. We write the clean, robust code that brings your vision to life, building digital solutions that are both powerful and perfect. Every build — a perfectly executed strategy.

Frontend Development

What it is: everything users see and interact with on your website or app.

What you get : fast, responsive, visually flawless interfaces that feel natural and effortless to use. We turn design into a smooth and intuitive user experience that strengthens your first impression.

Backend Development

What it is: the hidden engine that powers your product, including system logic, databases, and server operations.

What you get: A strong, secure, and scalable foundation that keeps your platform running smoothly regardless of complexity. This is the core architecture that supports every move you make.

iOS & Android App Development

What it is: native mobile applications built specifically for each platform.

What you get: high-performance apps that feel seamless, intuitive, and perfectly aligned with each device. Your audience receives an experience that feels completely natural.

Quality Assurance & Project Management

What it is: a full process of testing, reviewing, and coordinating the development cycle.

What you get: a stable and refined product where every feature is carefully checked before launch. We anticipate issues before they appear and ensure the final result plays flawlessly.

Technical Support

What it is: continuous monitoring, updates, and maintenance of your digital systems.

What you get: long-term reliability, security, and confidence as your platform evolves. This is consistent, strategic support that protects every step of your digital journey.

DevOps

What it is: a practice that improves how your product is built, deployed, and scaled in production.

What you get: faster releases, smoother processes, and infrastructure that adapts easily as you grow. This is complete optimization of your digital ecosystem.

A Strategy, Not Just a Sprint

Your Dedicated Team

No More Random Gambits

From day one, you are assigned a core team of strategists, designers, and engineers. This is your unit, deeply familiar with your project's every nuance. They are your knights and bishops, moving in concert towards your goal.

A Strategy, Not Just a Sprint

Transparency in Every Move

The Board is Always Open

We believe you should never have to guess the state of your project. Through our open Kanban board and shared dashboards, you can see the live status of every task, track progress against milestones, and access meeting notes and reports. No hidden moves, no surprises.

A Strategy, Not Just a Sprint

The Logic of Sprints

Momentum Through Measured Wins

We work in weekly sprints. Together, we plan the sequence of moves, breaking down the grand strategy into manageable tasks. Every week ends with a clear deliverable and a progress report. This ensures constant momentum and gives you a regular cadence of victories.

A Strategy, Not Just a Sprint

Always in Communication

Your Queen's Direct Line

Questions? Insights? Your dedicated project lead is your direct line. We respond with speed and clarity in your preferred channel—be it Slack, email, or a quick call. If you're pressed for time, we'll send a concise video update. We are an extension of your team, always within reach.

A Strategy, Not Just a Sprint

Focused on the Launch

Checkmate, Not Perpetual Check

Our process is engineered to get a quality, functional product to market as fast as possible. We parallel-track design and development to launch a robust MVP (Minimum Viable Product) early, avoiding the endless cycle of pre-launch iterations. We believe a live product is the first true win.

Why Choose Pure Mate

We are a team of strategists, designers, and developers united by a passion for creating digital products that make an impact. We become your trusted partner, taking ownership of your project's success from concept to launch and beyond.

Let's Make Your Winning Move

The board is set. You have the vision, we have the strategy. Share your challenge with us, and we will outline the decisive moves to secure your digital dominance. No random plays — just a calculated path to victory.
